attributes.action: To stop British Airways conducting redundancy save jobs
attributes.additional_details: To save our jobs and no one should go out of work as it's no one fault what the whole country and world are facing with convid 19
attributes.background: To help us save jobs and come up with a plan where everyone in British airways can have a job with a scheme as british airways think that government scheme won't help in the long run and things wint get back to normal in no time

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
